scripts.deploy: polymer build && timestamp=$(date "+%c") && gh-pages -d build/bundled -m "Deployed on $timestamp"
scripts.save: git stash && git pull origin master --rebase --prune && git stash pop && git add -A && git commit -am "$MESSAGE" && git push origin master;
scripts.serve: git stash && git pull origin master --rebase --prune && git stash pop && docker-compose pull && docker-compose up
